contest-event.event-date: Feb. 2, 1975 D Durham League Contest (Section B) Durham League Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-b The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Test Piece Contest Main Street Welfare Hall, Easington Prizes - 1st £18 and cup, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 4 bands competed. May 11, 2013, 9:36 p.m. Jan. 20, 2017, 6:57 p.m. 1 Aycliffe Brass Band S. Morris 2 Hetton Silver Band Tom Gibson 3 Consett-Whitbread Trophy J. J. Stobbs 4 Cockerton Prize Silver Band A. Price
